ProcessTemplates.Name: CSV file to JSON file
ProcessTemplates.Description: This process reads a CSV file from an SFTP server, then creates a JSON file from the contents and writes the file to an SFTP server.
ProcessTemplates.ProcessVariablesJson: {"InFilePath":{"Value":"\"/myFolder/mySubfolder/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Full path of the input file to be read without filename."},"InFileName":{"Value":"\"file.csv\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the input file to be read."},"InServerAddress":{"Value":"\"192.0.2.0\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Address of the input SFTP Server."},"InServerUser":{"Value":"\"myUser\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"User for the input SFTP Server."},"InServerPassword":{"Value":"\"myPassword\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Password the input SFTP Server."},"TargetFilePath":{"Value":"\"/myFolder/mySubfolder/\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Full path of the target file to be written."},"TargetFileName":{"Value":"\"target.json\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Name of the target file to be written."},"TargetServerAddress":{"Value":"\"192.0.2.1\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"Address of the target SFTP Server."},"TargetServerUser":{"Value":"\"myUser\"","IsSecret":false,"Mode":"text","Description":"User for the target SFTP Server."},"TargetServerPassword":{"Value":"\"myPassword\"","IsSecret":true,"Mode":"text","Description":"Password the target SFTP Server."}}

Process.Name: CSV file to JSON file
